item.description:
Recap of AWS re:Invent 2022 - App Integration, Serverless & DevSecOps Highlights

Overview

  • AWS re:Invent 2022 is in the bag! The 11th iteration of the annual cloud conference saw more than 50,000 partners and customers descend on Las Vegas in person, accompanied by more than 300,000 remote attendees.

     The world is asynchronous. The world is event-driven. â€” Dr. Werner Vogels, CTO, Amazon.com

  • It required a world stage to propagate asynchrony and event-driven architecture in our modern era of cloud computing. And thatâ€™s precisely what Dr. Werner Vogels delivered in his keynote at re:Invent 2022.
